rules.title: The rules
rules.body:
Say hello before making a request or using the bot, it will ignore you if your first message of the stream is a command.

The list presented on this page is generated automatically, all the songs aren't validated manually and thus can infringe the rules, it's up to you to respect them.

We don't accept the requests :

  • Without a guitar track, it's a guitar stream, not a singing one
  • Too hard, the purpose of the stream is not to test Warths' habilities
  • More than 8 minutes long, your request is not the only one
  • Troll request, it becomes uninteresting really quickly
  • Of genre extreme or avant-gardist, too complex to play without training
  • Japanese music, anime, or video game soundtrack, the charts are most of the time badly made

Any infringing request will be frozen or deleted (at the discretion of the moderators) and the song added to the ban list.

message.part2: You may find something you'd like.

Begin to type what you want to search, we'll try to find it for you.

Pro tip : press CTRL + SHIFT + F to access this field from anywhere on the page
